short.ar,bg: Easily arrange browser windows into saved user-defined grids, with multi-monitor support!
short.am,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,gu,kn,: Arrange browser windows up to your saved user-defined grid layouts in one-click, and with multi-monitor support!
short.ca,cs,da,de,el,es,et,fa,fi,fil,fr,he,hi,: You can easily split and separate tabs, split interface layout, and resize tabs by columns and rows. Multi-monitor support
short.zh_CN: 轻松把浏览器窗体放入自定义栏格内，可储存，并支持多屏幕！

long.zh_CN: 新加入自定义排版，随意分行列，随意切合，随意合拼。注意不要切得太小，你的浏览器可能显示不出来！
